name: vegalite-viewer
description: A data visualization MCP server using Vega-Lite with an integrated web viewer. Upload datasets and create interactive visualizations that open in your browser.

tools.name: upload_data
tools.description: Upload and register a dataset for later use in visualizations. Provide the name of the dataset (for later reference) and the dataset itself as a list of records/objects.

tools.name: visualize_data
tools.description: Create and display a visualization of a previously uploaded dataset using a Vega-Lite specification. The visualization opens in your web browser automatically.

prompts.name: Create a simple chart for a JSON dataset
prompts.description: Advises your LLM create a simple chart with a desired type for a provided JSON dataset
prompts.text: Create a simple ${arguments.chart_type} chart for the following JSON dataset and display it in my web browser: ${arguments.dataset}

viewer_web_server_port.title: Viewer Web Server Port
viewer_web_server_port.description: Port for the visualization web server

debug_mode.title: Debug Mode
debug_mode.description: Enable detailed debug logging for troubleshooting
